title: Firearms Expert Reacts to Starfield’s Guns
description:
Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down the guns of Starfield, including the P90 in space, the Grendel, a version of the 1911 called the Old Earth Pistol, and Starfield’s rendition of the classic ray gun, the Solstice.

00:00 - Opening
00:46 - Eon
02:52 - Drum Beat
05:37 - Rattler
07:19 - Grendel
08:53 - Beowulf
11:56 - Bridger
14:05 - Coachman
15:36 - Equinox
17:01 - Kodama
18:26 - Old Earth Pistol
21:10 - XM-2311
22:31 - Solstice
24:08 - Kraken
25:20 - Va’Ruun Inflictor

In the latest video in the Firearm Expert Reacts series, Jonathan Ferguson--a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries--breaks down the guns of Starfield and compares them to their real-life counterparts.

If you're interested in buying Starfield, GameSpot’s sister site, Fanatical, is selling the Premium Edition of the game, which  includes early access. You can save 17% when you use the code FANATICAL17 - https://www
